channel.title: Mills Family Resources on M. E. Mills
channel.description: Recent content in Mills Family Resources on M. E. Mills

item.title: Mills Portraits
item.description: These images were digitally scanned by Queens Public Library archives Jun 2022 from print photographs in their collection, The Mills Family of Jamaica and Mills Pond, Long Island, Archives at Queens Library, Queens Borough Public Library. The backs of photographs were also scanned and are shown beside the fronts.
